thread.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX slumps as Valeant tumbles, resource stocks weigh
thread.title_full: CANADA STOCKS-TSX slumps as Valeant tumbles, resource stocks weigh | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX slumps as Valeant tumbles, resource stocks weigh
text:
TORONTO, Sept 28 Canada's main stock index ended lower on Monday, dragged down by drugmaker Valeant Pharmaceutical International and resources companies hurt by falls in commodities from oil to gold to iron ore and copper.
The Toronto Stock Exchange's S&P/TSX composite index unofficially closed down 373.99 points, or 2.80 percent, at 13,004.58. All 10 main groups fell.
(Reporting by Alastair Sharp )
